name: Million Onion Hotel
description:
Million Onion Hotel is an action puzzle packed with a lot of elements!! A mysterious world of crazy sound and unique pixel arts and animations!
In BitSummit2014, This won the Media Highlights Award, Bit King Popularity Awards chosen by visitors' vote, and the game was chosen for IndieCade official Selection the same year.
And now, It is released At last !

***Action puzzles that can be infinitely worn! What?
Let's make lines diagonally, horizontally and vertically!
Action puzzle packed with many fun elements!

· Dr.'s strange enemies and gimmicks x30
· Story cards x 70
· Hidden characters x 30
· And a strange story & shocking ending!
· Elements of entrainment after ending as well !?

Strange mysterious game that you've never seen before finally comes on AppStore!
A lot of animated pixelated characters!
Sound Effect and BGMs are super fun as well!
To play with using headphone is highly recommended !

***Mysterious story
A long, long time ago, there was a tiny country between that country over there and this country over here.
In this country was a strange hotel. This hotel’s specialty was "magical onion soup".
They say many famous and great people came to taste this soup, though apparently not one of them thought to describe the flavor to anyone else. Maybe it’s because the soup had a hidden power. Yes . . . a secret power. One night, some esteemed guests find themselves suddenly sucked into a far- off galaxy!
Maybe this is because they . . . drank too much of the magical onion soup?

***Welcome to Dr's strange hotel!
This is an action puzzle but having a mysterious story!
Don't miss the mysterious destiny of guests in the hotel!?
Please experience the mysterious story that unique pixelated characters interweave!

***This game is for such people.
· I like pixel arts!
· I like happy game music!
· I like strange taste!
